      • read

        public static final int read(InputStream input)
                      throws IOException
        Read the next byte from the provided InputStream
        Parameters:
        input - the input stream to read from
        Returns:
        the next byte of data in the range 0-255 or -1 if end of stream is reached
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure in underlying layer

      • write

        public static final void write(OutputStream output,
                               int value)
                        throws IOException
        Write byte to the provided OutputStream. The 24 higher bits are ignored.
        Parameters:
        output - the output stream to write to
        value - the byte to write
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure in underlying layer
